# ui-alert

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                    | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Default              |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------- |
| `alignItems` | `align-items` | The alignment of all items in the alert. The alert itself is a flex container. | `"center" \| "end" \| "start" \| "stretch" \| { xs?: FlexAlignItems; sm?: FlexAlignItems; md?: FlexAlignItems; lg?: FlexAlignItems; xl?: FlexAlignItems; }`                                                                                                         | `'center'`           |
| `themeColor` | `theme-color` | The theme color to be used for this alert.                                     | `ThemeColor.DANGER \| ThemeColor.DARK \| ThemeColor.INFO \| ThemeColor.LIGHT \| ThemeColor.PRIMARY \| ThemeColor.SECONDARY \| ThemeColor.SUCCESS \| ThemeColor.WARNING \| { xs?: ThemeColor; sm?: ThemeColor; md?: ThemeColor; lg?: ThemeColor; xl?: ThemeColor; }` | `ThemeColor.PRIMARY` |
